name: Animal Cafe (itch)
description:
Become a barista for the creatures of the forest! Use the tools provided to make a variety of coffee drinks for the woodland patrons of your little cafe.

Created for the 2022 Cozy Autumn Game Jam.

• • • • •

Browser Compatability Note

This game runs in-browser as a WebGL program built with Unity. In the past, I've observed several browsers to have compatibility issues with this build format. It appears to work on Chrome, Brave, and likely other Chromium-based browsers, but you may have trouble running the game on Safari – if this is the case, I apologize. Please comment below if you have browser compatibility issues so I can keep track of potential problems in the future.
